chapter.text: Swad, ngujilumbila Qur’an jajikwete chikumbusyo
Nambo awala waakufuulu ali nkulikwesya ni kusisya
Ana mikutula jilingwa jatwajijonasile paujo pao! Ni wagumisile, kutendaga ndema jakokochela jili jipitene
Ni akusimonga ya kwaichilila nkutetela kuumila mwa jamanjao, achimakafili ni akutiji: “Aju ni nsawi, jwaunami kusyene.”
“Ana jujitesile milungu (josope) kuwa nnungu jumo! Chisimu chalakwechi ni chindu chakusimosya.”

Ni wawigwile achinkulungwa mwa wanganyao (kupita nchigombelesya yanti): “Jendelechelani (pa dini jenu), soni jipililililani milungu jenu (pa kujigalagatila), chisimu chalakwechi ni chindu (chakusakala) chachikusachikwa (kukwetu, chakuti tuleche dini jetu).”
“Nganitupikaneje yalakweyi (yakuwa nnungu jumo namuno) mu dini jambesiji (ja chikilisito), nganiyiwatu ayi ikaweje unami.”
“Ana pa chilikati petu chikumbusyo ni chitulusyiidwe kukwakwe (pe)?” Nambo wanganyao ali mu kaichila ya chikumbusyo Changu, nambo nganapasye ilagasyo (Yangu)
Kapena akwete wanganyao imatiilo ya ukoto wa Ambuje wenu (Allah) Wamachili gakupunda, Wakupeleka kwannope
Kapena akwete wanganyao uchimwene wa kumawunde ni petaka ni yaili chilikati chakwe? Basi (naga ili iyyo), akwele m’makwelelo (kuja kwinani)
(Aga makafiliga pamo ni kulikwesya kwao) kawele kankutula kangali machili mwanti tikakomboledwe yagatite pakomboledwa makuga (ga makafili) kalakala (gagakanilaga utenga wa Achimitume)
Wakaaniile paujo pao wandu wa Nuhu, Adi ni Firiauna nsyene ichili (yakulimbanganyichisya uchimwene wakwe; wali asilikali)
Kwisa soni Samuda, wandu wa Lutwi ni akutama nyyitekete (wandu wa Shuaibu). Jalakwejo ni mikutula (ja makafili jatwajijonasile)
Pangali jwalijose mwa jamanjao ikaweje jwakaaniile Achimitenga, basi ni yasimichiche ipotesi Yangu
Ni ngakwembecheya wanganyawa ikaweje n’gumilo umpepe (wa lipenga lya Kiyama) wangali kuusyaausya
Wanganyao ni akutiji (mwachipongwe): “Ambuje wetu! Tupani mwachitema chipande chetu (cha malipilo ga masengo getu gambone ni gakusakala) nkaniliyiche Lisiku Lyachiwalanjilo.”

Pililani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) pa yaakuwecheta, ni munkumbuchile kapolo Jwetu Daudi nsyene machili (gakwendechesya utume ni uchimwene), chisimu jwalakwe jwaliji jwakuujilaujila (kwa Allah pakutenda toba)
Chisimu Uwwe twagajepepesye matumbi kuti gaswejesyeje (Lumbili Lwetu) pamo ni jwalakwe (Daudi) kwigulo ni kundawi
Nombe nayo ijuni (yaliji nkuswejesya najo) ili isonganganyisyidwe, yosope yene (matumbi ni ijuni) yaliji yakumpikanila (Daudi)
Ni twaulimbangenye uchimwene wakwe, ni twampele lunda lwakusokoka nambo soni kwilanya chenene magambo (ni chine chilichose)
Ana jinyyiche abali ja akukangana ndema ja wakwesile lipupa mpaka kwinjila ku chigunguli (chakuswalila Daudi)

Ndema ja wan’jinjilile Daudi, basi jwalakwe ni wajogwepe wanganyao. Wanganyao watite: “Nkajogopa, (uwwe ni) akukangana wawili, jumo jwetu ankotwesye n’jakwe, basi jilanyani chilikati chetu mwachilungamiko ni nkajimila mbali, soni tujongolelani kwitala lyagoloka.”

“Chisimu aju nnongo n’jangu; jukwete ngondolo syekongwe makumi nsano nancheche kwisa nsano nancheche , sano une ni ngwete ngondolo jekongwe jimope, sano ni jukuti: ‘Mumbani jimojo nansunjile.’ (Sano une nansyene ni ngangusaka), ni jumbundile pa kawechete.”

(Daudi) jwatite: “Chisimu antesile lupuso pakuwenda ngondolo jenu jekongwe kuti ajiwanganye ku ngondolo syakwe syekongwe, chisimu wajinji mwa akuwanganya nao ichindu akasakotosyanaga wane ni wane, ikaweje awala waakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone, soni wanti iyyoyowo nganatupa.” Ni jwasimichisye Daudi kuti chisimu tun’dinjile mayeso, basi ni jwaawendile chikululuko Ambujegwe (Allah), ni jwasenjelemukwiche kwinama (kuswali) ni jwaujile (kwa Allah pakutenda toba)
Basi twankululuchile yalakweyo, soni chisimu jwalakwe jukwete Kukwetu uchimbichimbi kwisa soni malo gambone nnope gakuujila (ku Mbepo)

“E mmwe Daudi! Chisimu Uwwe tuntesile mmwe kuwa wakulolela pachilambo, basi jilanyani chilikati cha wandu mwa chilungamiko, soni ngasinkuya isako (yantima wenu) itakwisa mwainsokonesye kuleka litala lya Allah. Chisimu awala waakusokonechela kuleka litala lya Allah, akwete kupata wanganyao ilagasyo yaukali nnope ligongo lyakuliwalila kwao Lisiku Lyachiwalanjilo.”
Ni nganitugumba mawunde ni mataka ni yaili chilikati chakwe mwamasanje. Syele ni nganisyo sya awala waakufuulu. Basi ipotesi yakuumila ku Moto takaipate awala waakufuulu
Ana twatende awala waakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone nti chisawu akuwatanganya pachilambo? Kapena twatende wawoga (wakun’jogopa Allah) nti chisawu akulewa
(Achi ni) Chitabu (cha Qur’an) chatuchitulwisye kukwenu (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) chaupile wejinji kuti agachetelele (wandu) ma Aya gakwe ni kuti wakwete lunda akumbuchile
Ni twampele Daudi (mwanache lina lyakwe) Sulaimana. Kaje umbone nnope kapolo jwakwe! Chisimu jwalakwe (Sulaimana) jwaliji jwakuujilaujila (kwa Allah pakutenda toba)
(Kumbuchilani) ndema ja syaonesyedwe kukwakwe kwigulo hachi syakutulala nnope pati sijimi, syakuutuka nnope
Basi jwatite: “Chisimu une nainonyele nnope yambone (hachi), kwakuleka kwakumbuchila Ambuje wangu (Allah pangaswali swala ja Asr) mpakana (lyuwa) lisiwiliche mu chakusiwilila (pakutiwila).”
“Siuchisyani kukwangu (hachisyo).” Basi ni jwatandite kusipukuta sonjo ni ngosi
Soni chisimu twan’dinjile Sulaimana mayeso, ni twaponyisye pa chitengu chakwe (cha uchimwene) chiwiliwili (lijini lyalyasumwile uchimwene wakwe kwa kandawi), kaneka ni jwaujile (ku uchimwene wakwe)
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Ambuje wangu! Mungululuchilani, ni mumbe uchimwene wangam’bajila jwalijose panyuma pangune, chisimu Mmwejo ni wan’di Wakupeleka kwannope.”
Basi twan’jepepachisye mbungo jajajendaga mwambolembole mwa lilalumusi lyakwe (kuja) kulikose kwajukusaka
Ni (twan’jepepachisye soni) mashetani, waliose wakutawa (yakutawatawa) ni wakutiwila (m’mbwani kukusosa ngalekale)
Sano wane waliji wagamba kutawidwa m’maunyolo (wakunyosya malamusi gakwe)
(Allah wansalile kuti): “Awu ni ntuka Wetu (watumpele), basi tolani (kumpa jwankunsaka) kapena umbatani, mwangali chiwalanjilo.”
Soni chisimu jwalakwe jukwete Kukwetu uchimbichimbi kwisa soni malo gambone nnope gakuujila (ku Mbepo)
Soni munkumbuchilani kapolo Jwetu Ayyubu, ndema ja jwawilasile Ambujegwe (Allah ni jwatite): “Chisimu une jungwayiye shetani ni masausyo kwisa soni ipotesi.”
(Allah wansalile kuti): “Putisyani lukongolo lwenu (petaka, tipakopoche mesi). Aga (mesi) gakoga gakusisima (basi jogani) nambo soni gakumwa (basi mwaani).”
Ni twampele wapewasa wakwe ni wane wanti mpela wawowo soni, kuwa ukoto wakuuma Kukwetu, ni chikumbusyo ku waakwete lunda

“Soni jigalani munkono mwenu katenje (ka tutela twawanawana) ni mwapute nako (wankwenu pa yangalumbana yawatesile), ni nkawesesya kulumbila kwenu.” Chisimu Uwwe twansimene jwalakwe kuti jwaliji jwakupilila. Kaje umbone nnope kapolo jwakwe! Chisimu jwalakwe jwaliji jwakuujilaujila (kwa Allah pakutenda toba)
Soni mwakumbuchilani achikapolo Wetu Ibrahima, Isihaka ni Yaakubu achinsyene machili (gakwendechesya dini) ni kulola (kwaumanyilisi)
Chisimu Uwwe twasagwile wanganyao pakwapa ndamo jambone ja kumbuchila Nyumba Jambesi (ja Akhera)
Soni chisimu wanganyao Kukwetu waliji wakusagulidwa soni wambone
Soni munkumbuchilani Ismaila, Al-yasa‘a (Eliya) ni Dhul-Kifli (Yesaya), soni wosope wene waliji mu wandu wambone
Achi ni chikumbusyo. Sano chisimu wawoga (wakun’jogopa Allah) akwete kupata malo gakuujila gambone nnope
Matimbe Gandamo, gatigakawe geugulidwe milango kwaugulila wanganyao
Takawe ali ajegeme (mwakwegama) kwalakweko, achiwilasyaga kwalakweko isogosi yejinji ni yakumwa
Soni kukwao tikukawe kwana (achiwammakwao) wakulola pejipi (wakwalola achalume waope wangatenda meso mwamwamwa kwa achalume wane), wakulandana misingu
Ayi ni yankupedwa chilanga ya Lisiku Lyachiwalanjilo
Chisimu ali ni lisiki Lyetu lyangamala
Ayi (ichiwa iyyo). Sano chisimu wakusumba mpika (pakunnyosya Allah) akwete kupata malo gakuujila gakusakala nnope
Jahannama, takajijinjile. Basi kaje kusakala liuto lyagusama (lyalitandichile)
Ayi (ichiwa iyyo). Basi agapasye wanganyao galakwe - mesi gamasemule nnope ni uwowu
Ni (ipotesi) yine yanti chisawu iyyiyi yamitundumitundu

(Tachisalilidwa akukuyidwa pakuponyedwa kumoto pamo ni akukuya): “Awu ni nkutula waukwinjila pamo ni jenumanja (ku Moto).” (Akukuyidwa tachiti): “Wangali pakwichila pambone wanganyao. Chisimu wanganyao tapye Moto.”

(Akukuya) tachiti: “Nambo jenumanja ni wankuwajilwa ngakola pakwichila pambone, jenumanja ni wantutendekasyisye uwwe kupata ayi (ipotesiyi pakutusochelesya ku duniya), basi kaje kusakala malo gakutamilichika gakwe!”
Wanganyao takajile: “Ambuje wetu! Watutendekasyisye uwwe kupata yalakweyi, basi mwajonjechesyani ilagasyo yakawili m’Moto.”
Wanganyao ni takajile: “Chipali chichi kukwetu, uli ngatukwaona achalume watwaliji nkwaganichisya kuti ali mu wandu wakusakala (ligongo lyakunkuya Muhammadi ﷺ)?”
“Ana twatesile chipongwe (ku duniya kutendaga ali wambone wakuwajilwa kwinjila ku Mbepo), kapena gatekwakulusya meso (getu nambo tuli nao imo m’Moto muno)?”
Chisimu ayi ni yakuona yakangana wandu wa ku Moto
Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “Chisimu une ni nkutetela pe, soni pangali nnungu jwine (jwakuwajilwa kun’galagatila) ikaweje Allah Jumpepe, Jwamachili gangalimbana nago.”
“M’mbuje jwa mawunde ni mataka ni yaili chilikati chakwe, Jwamachili gakupunda, Jwakululuka kusyene.”
Jilani: “Aji (Qur’an) jiwele abali jekulungwa nnope.”
“Jankujitundumalila wanganyammwe.”
“Nganingola umanyilisi wakwayana ni nkutula wakwinani (Achimalaika) ndema jawaliji nkukangana (pa yagumbidwa kwa Adam).”
“Nganiyijuwulidwa kukwangu, ikaweje yanti une ni nkutetela jwakuonechela.”
(Kumbuchilani) ndema jawawechete Ambuje wenu (Allah) kwa Achimalaika kuti: “Chisimu Une tingumbe mundu kuumila mwilongo.”
“Sano patimale kunkolosya ni kumpepelela nsimu wakuuma Kukwangu, basi munsenjelemuchile pakunsujudila.”
Basi ni wasujudu Achimalaika wosope wene nakamo
Ikaweje Ibulisu, jwalikwesyisye ni jwaliji mwa makafili
(Allah) jwatite: “E mmwe Ibulisu! Chichi chinnekasyisye kunsujudila ajula junan’gumbile ni Makono Gangu ganagawili? Ana n’dikwesyisye kapena n’di mwa wapenani kusyene?”
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Une ni jwambone nnope kumpunda jwalakweju, mwangumbile une kuumila m’moto, ni mun'gumbile jwalakweju kuumila mwilongo
(Allah) jwatite: “Basi kopokani mwalakwemo, mwanti chisimu mmwe (sano) n’di wakuwinjidwa.”
“Soni chisimu pachanya penu pana malweso Gangu mpaka Lisiku Lyamalipilo.”
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Ambuje wangu! Mumbanitu lipesa (lyakuti ngawa) mpaka lisiku lyatachiukulidwa (m’malembe achiiumbe wosope).”
(Allah) jwatite: “Basi chisimu mmwe n’di mwa akupedwa lipesa.”
“Kwikanila lisiku lya ndema jakumanyika (jagombedwa lipenga lyandanda, pele ni patinchiwila).”
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Ngugalumbila machili Genu gakupunda! Tinasokonesye kwene wanaose.”
“Pangawaga achikapolo Wenu wakuswejesyedwa mwa wanganyao.”
(Allah) jwatite: “Ngulumbila kusyene, soni yakuona nguwecheta.”
“Tingajigumbasye kwene Jahannama ni mmwe pamo ni wataachinkuuya mwa wanganyao wosope wene.”
Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “Ngangun’juga pa yalakweyi malipilo galigose, soni nganimba une mwa akulikanganichisya (kutenda yangawa nkuikombola).”
“Nganijiwatu aji (Qur’an) ikaweje chikumbusyo ku iwumbe yosope.”
“Soni timmanyilile kwene (kalulila kwa) abali jakwe pangakawapa.”
